price: Enti (Nyankopͻn a, ͻnam anwanwa kwan a yɛakyerε yi so bͻͻ onipa no), Onni tumi sε Ɔbɛnyane owufoͻ aba nkwa mu (bio)?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
